mapper.select: select a.room_id, a.room_title, a.room_address, a.room_deposit, a.room_rent, a.room_images, b.mem_age, b.mem_gender, b.mem_confirm from sr_room a, sr_member b where a.mem_id=b.mem_id order by room_id
select tag_id, tag_content from sr_tag where room_id=#{param1} order by tag_id
select a.room_id, b.option_group, b.option_name from sr_room_option a, sr_option b where room_id=#{param1} and a.option_id=b.option_id
mapper.insert: insert into sr_keyword(keyword_id, mem_id, keyword_content) values(seq_sr_keyword.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2})
mapper.select: select room_id from sr_wish_list where mem_id=#{param1} and room_id=#{param2}
mapper.delete: delete from sr_wish_list where mem_id=#{param1} and room_id=#{param2}
